sqlMap.update: insert into xiaoshoutubiaotongji (tongjishijian,operatorId,itime,detail) values(#tongjishijian#,#operatorId#,(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),#detail#)
update xiaoshoutubiaotongji set tongjishijian=#tongjishijian#, itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),detail=#detail# where id=#id#
update xiaoshoutubiaotongji set deleteFlag=#deleteFlag# where id in ( $id$ )
